overview: The holidays are all about family, friends, food…and fucking? Leave it to these guys to get it in during the most wonderful—and stressful—time of the year. From exes revisiting the past, to friends who want more, and relationships on the rocks, everyone has their own yuletide drama to contend with. “Holiday Affairs” brings you along for the ride as romances bloom, friendships are challenged, and horny hotties have a ball giving and getting in the bedroom.  Ring in 2021 with boys who like to have a lot of fun and show off the good times.
title: Holiday Affairs
